snippet.title: Tenderfoot Tactics: Festival of the Spirit Trailer
snippet.description:
It's the yearly Festival of the Spirit and this time, the grand prize is yours, you just know it! A small prequel story to Tenderfoot Tactics, an open world tactics RPG coming soon to PC.

Demo playable during the Steam Summer Games Festival: June 16th - 22nd
*Now available on itch.io: https://sonofbadru.itch.io/festival

FULL GAME out now! (Steam and itch.io): https://linktr.ee/tenderfoottactics
About Ice Water Games: https://linktr.ee/icewatergames

Badru
Michael Bell
Isa Hutchinson
Taylor Thomas
Zoe Vartanian
Madison Pathe
